Package com.ooyala.android.ui

Interface Summary
LayoutController  
OoyalaPlayerControls  
 

Class Summary
OoyalaPlayerLayoutController This LayoutController is a generic LayoutController that will work in most cases (regardless of the containing Layout type).
OptimizedOoyalaPlayerLayoutController This LayoutController is a faster LayoutController that will work only on one specific case: The OoyalaPlayerLayout it controls is a direct child of the Activity's base layout which is a FrameLayout.
